s.text: Henry Adams said, "Pierpont Morgan is apparently trying to swallow the sun."
Henry Adams said, "Pierpont Morgan is apparently trying to swallow the sun."

As America's unofficial central banker, Morgan tried to rein in the excesses of the business cycle, stifle speculative manias, control corporate competition, keep the currency "sound," and stop panics.
A few weeks later he capitalized the new corporation (which included other steel mills, railroads, mines, steamships, and ore lands) at $1.
